Title: Xna Multiplatform Animation System
Description: XMas is a complete graphical animation system for XNA based in Unreal Animation Editor. You can create animations graph and bind with reflexion to your class. XMas include a graphical editor and a library for XBOX36
HomeWiki:
Project Description

XMas is a complete graphical animation system for XNA based in Unreal Animation Editor.You can create animations graph and bind with reflexion to your class. XMas include a graphical editor and a library for XBOX36.
You can check the current Documentation or a complete Tutorial

News

12-21-2008 -- Today is xmas day!! Initial release!! Download now !!

Features

  • Graphical editor
  • XBOX360 and Windows support
  • Basic animation nodes included: crossfade, blendlist, rangedcrossfade, random
  • Support to create custom animation nodes
  • Cal3d importer
  • XNA 3.0

Planing

  • More models importers
  • Custom model importers

Credits

XMas written by Jose Arias Email me!
Cald3d importer and skeleton library by Spear
Gradient Panel by Own
